hicpp-deprecated-headers.description:
Description

The
hicpp-deprecated-headers
check is an alias, please see
modernize-deprecated-headers
for more information.
It enforces the
rule 1.3.3
.
hicpp-deprecated-headers.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
